reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 665/20: GENERAL MATTERS UNDER THE AUTHORITY OF THE LIEUTENANT GOVERNOR IN COUNCIL
reg_info.reg_name_text: GENERAL MATTERS UNDER THE AUTHORITY OF THE LIEUTENANT GOVERNOR IN COUNCIL

content.content: 1. For the purposes of clause 28 (3) (b) of the Act, (a) the Niagara Parks Police Service may disclose that the SIU Director has been notified of an incident or matter involving a special constable and is making preliminary inquiries or conducting an investigation into it; and (b) the Legislative Assembly of Ontario may disclose that the SIU Director has been notified of an incident or matter involving a peace officer and is making preliminary inquiries or conducting an investigation into it.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of clause 28 (3) (b) of the Act,

(a) the Niagara Parks Police Service may disclose that the SIU Director has been notified of an incident or matter involving a special constable and is making preliminary inquiries or conducting an investigation into it; and

(b) the Legislative Assembly of Ontario may disclose that the SIU Director has been notified of an incident or matter involving a peace officer and is making preliminary inquiries or conducting an investigation into it.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
